Orphea.name: Shadow Waltz
Orphea.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 165 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Hitting a Hero with Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 2 seconds, refunds 35 Mana, and causes Orphea to dash a short distance upon moving.

Orphea.name: Chomp
Orphea.description: After 0.625 seconds, deal 305 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies in front of Orphea.

Orphea.name: Dread
Orphea.description: Release a wave of dread that deals 85 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Dread erupts 0.75 seconds after reaching the end of its path, dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies hit by Dread's wave or eruption are Slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.

Orphea.name: Crushing Jaws
Orphea.description: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

Orphea.name: Eternal Feast
Orphea.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

Orphea.name: Overflowing Chaos
Orphea.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability grants 1 Chaos. Chaos can stack up to 3 times.  While Orphea has Chaos, her Basic Attacks against Heroes consume all Chaos, dealing 50% increased damage per stack, and healing for 100% of the damage dealt.

1.name: En Pointe
1.description: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 90% damage to enemies hit by its end.

1.name: Growing Nightmare
1.description: Increase Dread's eruption damage by 40%.   Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single cast of Dread's eruption.  Reward: Permanently increase Dread's eruption damage by an additional 25% and increase the Slow amount of Dread's eruption by 15%.

1.name: Ancestral Strength
1.description: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 15% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies. Enemy Heroes who are hit with Overflowing Chaos are Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Allegrissimo
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Shadow Waltz by 1 second.  Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Backbiter
4.description: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15% maximum Health.

4.name: Chaotic Assault
4.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes while having 3 stacks of Chaos deal an additional 75% bonus damage.

7.name: Insatiable
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 2 seconds.

7.name: Ravenous Hunger
7.description: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

7.name: Mind Devourer
7.description: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 5, up to 150.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

10.name: Eternal Feast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

10.name: Crushing Jaws
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Determination
13.description: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

13.name: Abyssal Symbiosis
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos and a 170 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.

13.name: Invasive Miasma
13.description: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.

16.name: Bond of Anguish
16.description: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

16.name: Dead Magic
16.description: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 90 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to the target and all enemies around them.

16.name: Lurking Terror
16.description: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area. Enemy Heroes hit by this Chomp are Slowed by 70% for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Monster Within
20.description: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Basic Abilities recharge 150% faster.

20.name: Engulfing Oblivion
20.description: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 3 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

20.name: Eldritch Conduit
20.description: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

20.name: Final Toccata
20.description: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.
